description: This is a market on whether any post on President Donald J. Trump’s communication platform will include the word “rigged”. This market will resolve to “Yes” if, after May 14, 2021, 5:00 PM ET and before May 31, 12:00 PM ET, any post appears on President Trump’s communication platform, From the Desk of Donald J. Trump (https://www.donaldjtrump.com/desk), which mentions the word “rigged”. For the purposes of this market, a mention will include a mention of the word “rigged” in text as well as any audio or video clips which include the word “rigged”. The exact word mentioned must be “rigged". Words such as “rig” or “rigging” will not count. This market will resolve to “No” if “rigged” is not mentioned between the start date and the resolution date. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

markets.question: Will Donald Trump mention the word “rigged” on his communications platform by May 31?

title: Will Donald Trump mention the word “rigged” on his communications platform by May 31?
